title: Jungle is a mess
body:
I got autofilled earlier today, played my man Warwick;

Holy crap is jungling awful.  Like I thought the new stuff would make it interesting. Sorry to say I walked away from that experience disappointed.  There's just so much wrong I don't even know where to begin.

I think the single largest issue is the experience nerf. How am I to gank a lane when I'm 3 levels below them?  With the changes to dragon I basically spend my entire life bot-side jungle, because I have to make sure bot lane maintains presence every time a dragon comes up.  Why? Because dragons are basically THE win condition.

It's nuts.

Jungle mains, I don't know how you put up with that, my hats off to you because that is a god awful mess.

replies.body: If you want a real fun time try support; it is like jungle but without the gold income.

Support main here.
You're completely right about the gold income thing, it's as awful as the solo laners' experience gain and how they can win the game by power-farming and killing each other. They also do this while having little interaction with other lanes. Preseason is a mess but this preseason has been the absolute worst :D
We're both getting the short end of the stick my friend.
I am a Jungle main, and I endorse this message.
You plebs, gank lanes tactically to soak exp {{sticker:sg-ezreal}}

> [{quoted}](name=Ashe mage AD,realm=EUNE,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=RxdNcmcR,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2019-11-24T21:24:27.979+0000)
>
> You plebs, gank lanes tactically to soak exp {{sticker:sg-ezreal}}

Hey I'm not a jungle main, did the best I knew how.

I play really simple junglers like Warwick specifically because when I jungle I'm ~~usually~~ almost always autofilled.

I said that more as a meme but ok. And also, I'm living that meme xDDD When my laners die and I'm near I'm like 

{{sticker:slayer-pantheon-rainbows}}

> [{quoted}](name=Ashe mage AD,realm=EUNE,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=RxdNcmcR,comment-id=000000000000,timestamp=2019-11-24T21:42:46.251+0000)
>
> I said that more as a meme but ok. And also, I'm living that meme xDDD When my laners die and I'm near I'm like 
> 
> {{sticker:slayer-pantheon-rainbows}}

My favorite is when you are taking scuttle, and you abandon it to help them, they're spam pinging you for help... but what are they doing? Running farther away towards their tower rather than running down to you to make it 2v1... and then they still blame your ass
Just as long they die the fk up so I can hog a wave or 2 xDD

> [{quoted}](name=Ashe mage AD,realm=EUNE,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=RxdNcmcR,comment-id=00000000000000000000,timestamp=2019-11-25T12:30:45.797+0000)
>
> Just as long they die the fk up so I can hog a wave or 2 xDD

Yesterday I had a guy, helped him gank I got the kill, so I was like you got that CS, I will go scuttle. He pings help on the wave so I'm like OK dude wants me to help shove it in. Then he starts pinging me back and I was just like... alright man screw your lane. He ended up feeding the rest of the game.

I feel like shoving should be the default action in that scenario but then again I'm that kinda player that prioritizes towers, it's hard to tell without seeing it but maybe he was on to something but then because you walked away it meant it couldn't be done anymore in a timely manner. Maybe it was the difference between getting a tower plate or not for example.

> [{quoted}](name=knightmage101,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=RxdNcmcR,comment-id=0000000000000000,timestamp=2019-11-25T04:55:38.431+0000)
>
> My favorite is when you are taking scuttle, and you abandon it to help them, they're spam pinging you for help... but what are they doing? Running farther away towards their tower rather than running down to you to make it 2v1... and then they still blame your ass

So much this it isn't even funny. 

Better yet this season when they think you should be able to take a 2v1 while being 1-2 levels behind..
ofc we do, jungle doesn't give any
If anyone played ONE match in the jungle like you did there would be no argument, instead we also have to put up with solo laners cheering for our disgrace.

> [{quoted}](name=BlackXIV,realm=EUW,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=RxdNcmcR,comment-id=0007,timestamp=2019-11-25T04:53:15.924+0000)
>
> If anyone played ONE match in the jungle like you did there would be no argument, instead we also have to put up with solo laners cheering for our disgrace.

Hey, here is something I don't think most people have noticed at least at large... the scuttle XP is untouched. So taking them has become super important again without Riot outright coming out and saying it.
While this can be convenient I think that's another issue. If a jungler grabs both scuttles on the first spawn he outlevels the other instantly by 1-2 levels and can kick him out of his own jungle.

> [{quoted}](name=BlackXIV,realm=EUW,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=RxdNcmcR,comment-id=000700000000,timestamp=2019-11-25T05:13:50.599+0000)
>
> While this can be convenient I think that's another issue. If a jungler grabs both scuttles on the first spawn he outlevels the other instantly by 1-2 levels and can kick him out of his own jungle.

2 scuttles account for half the level 4, that's not even a full level, so you have to fuckup really hard to be 2 levels behind your ennemy jungle. Also scuttles are less a problem now because in the former season if you did not or could not fight the scuttles you woud full clear and then have nothing to do.

Now if you do not touch the scuttles you can full clear, recall and do a full clear again immediatly since everything respawn faster. The hard part of the preseason is to educate the laners that they will get way less ganks than in s7, 8, 9 because now junglers actually have to clear their jungle.

> [{quoted}](name=BlackXIV,realm=EUW,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=RxdNcmcR,comment-id=000700000000,timestamp=2019-11-25T05:13:50.599+0000)
>
> While this can be convenient I think that's another issue. If a jungler grabs both scuttles on the first spawn he outlevels the other instantly by 1-2 levels and can kick him out of his own jungle.

Pretty much.

Jungle has devolved in who wins the 1v1 match up between the junglers since invading enemy jungle is so profitable if you have the winning match up.

Previously you could make up the deficit of invades by getting xp from ganks and lane xp, but they've kept nerfing that and tried to push junglers back into the jungle, which leaves you basically in a game of hoping the enemy jungler never catches you or you have laners who actually move to contest invades on you.

Farm assassin junglers like kayn/eve/khazix feel like total garbage now since early game bullies like rek'sai/ekko/voli/warwick/udyr/xin zhao can just walk into your jungle and steal your camp and you can't do anything unless you want to feed them a kill. A single jungle camp will put you at an xp deficit which means in no time the enemy jungler will outlevel you and you will never be able to fight him again or skirmish in river.

What's more, teams who are smart know to focus the losing jungler in skirmishes and teamfights since they know the jungle besides support is now the lowest lv character in the match most of the time with the least items early to mid game.

> [{quoted}](name=Crescent Dusk,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=RxdNcmcR,comment-id=0007000000000000,timestamp=2019-11-25T05:28:48.112+0000)
>
> Pretty much.
> 
> Jungle has devolved in who wins the 1v1 match up between the junglers since invading enemy jungle is so profitable if you have the winning match up.
> 
> Previously you could make up the deficit of invades by getting xp from ganks and lane xp, but they've kept nerfing that and tried to push junglers back into the jungle, which leaves you basically in a game of hoping the enemy jungler never catches you or you have laners who actually move to contest invades on you.
> 
> Farm assassin junglers like kayn/eve/khazix feel like total garbage now since early game bullies like rek'sai/ekko/voli/warwick/udyr/xin zhao can just walk into your jungle and steal your camp and you can't do anything unless you want to feed them a kill. A single jungle camp will put you at an xp deficit which means in no time the enemy jungler will outlevel you and you will never be able to fight him again or skirmish in river.
> 
> What's more, teams who are smart know to focus the losing jungler in skirmishes and teamfights since they know the jungle besides support is now the lowest lv character in the match most of the time with the least items early to mid game.

Reminds me of when scuttle first came into the game and the jungle meta instantly shifted into 'Who wins the 1v1 over the scuttle early and what teammates know this is what is happening in the jungle and comes to help contest scuttle'

So you got autofilled in a patched jungle you have 0 experience with and wonder why it doesn't work for you??

You make one 3 camps early lvl 3 gank on the lane you want (around 2:40 depends on your clearing speed) and after that you continue ganking botlane because they are same lvl and give you prio at Drake.

Don't touch toplane except it's a 100% kill.

Btw. Warwick is atm. No.1 Jungler in terms of winrate in Dia+
Right now at 55%
There it is, the solo laner who basks in his own unwarranted advantages

> [{quoted}](name=BlackXIV,realm=EUW,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=RxdNcmcR,comment-id=00030000,timestamp=2019-11-25T04:56:12.751+0000)
>
> There it is, the solo laner who basks in his own unwarranted advantages

What's really funny is that in S9 solo laners were already outpacing everyone else in levels usually 2-3 up by mid game unless they were getting stomped or their jungler was over taxing. Now they outpace by 3-5.
I am otp Jungle

I main jg and earlier I played a ranked where their olaf was camping my bot so I was playing around my top side (winning). Olaf got 2 drags while I got the two rift heralds(I got mid and top turret and they had bot turret) little did I realise macro doesn't really matter anymore because once they got all pressure bot they proceeded to get 4 drags and we got baron. They STOMPED us.
Sorry you got outjungled by a jg main while you were autofilled, tell us more about this horrible experience
Only boards will downvote you for telling the truth.

> [{quoted}](name=BigFBear,realm=EUW,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=RxdNcmcR,comment-id=00020000,timestamp=2019-11-25T02:24:55.534+0000)
>
> Only boards will downvote you for telling the truth.

I main JG and it's somewhat true, hyper carry jgs that can clear fast and fight around dragon are the entire meta, and it's BOOOORIIINNG!

Tried playing support, but people are fleeing the JG so fast I got autofilled JG every single time (like 4-5 in a row) til I switched secondary to ADC.

Now trying Ivern cause I'd rather lose doing something not boring than win while bored to death.

> [{quoted}](name=BigFBear,realm=EUW,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=RxdNcmcR,comment-id=00020000,timestamp=2019-11-25T02:24:55.534+0000)
>
> Only boards will downvote you for telling the truth.

lmao.. the fact you're downvoted is hilarious, and proves you right..

Sorry you feel the need to mock someone out of an argument you have no knowledge of. Most jungle mains agree, the exp is bad, the timers are impossible to keep up and the meta shucks because all you can do is take dragons except you cannot even do that without mid and bot.

What about you listen to me? 
Ok, I'm a jungle main who plays mostly Kayn. And I used to have the best games before jungle nerfs in s8. After the nerfs I just stopped playing jg and played other roles till these changes in preseason MADE JUNGLE SO CLEAN. I CAN PLAY KAYN AGAIN. I can counter jungle again. I can choose what I want to do in jungle instead of camping a Tristana asshole!.
How are you talking about the jungle when you got auotofilled? You played ww once and you judge the game by this? I mean, if you're going to play WW and get red than gank than gank than gank without farming like the game was 2 weeks ago, sorry that's not available anymore. None want a lee sin camping with 4 cs at 5 mins above by 3 levels from botlane. The changes made farming champions better, nerfed early ganks champs, revived jungle strategies.
And you said that you spent your life in bot side because of dragons, which is normal for jungles. We kept doing in since the dragons were a thing.

So, keep playing your role. Stop talking about jungle. Don't be that adc main who plays support with Thresh for the first time and cries that support is ez and your supps are suck. 

To jg mains complaining about everything : Stop playing Lee Sin and ganking all times like you used to fucking do, the jungle is better if you play smart. Gank than go cs and gank and go cs again, its ezier to get fed with these early game champs if you use your brain. I tried most junglers and its ezier to plaay jungle now. You're just brainwashed by Riot because of 1 whole season.

Again, play fucking smart.

LOL, Kayn was top tier jungler S9, the things you describing you can 'do now in preseason' was shit Kayn's been doing all of S9.

LOL kAyN wAs tOp tIeR jUnGlEr s9.
Dude, I played him most of s9. Worst like most of farmer junglers (Shyvana for example, at least she was able to just build AP and E in teamfights to get the squishy enemy). Kayn just can't, champs like Lee Sin are able to just gank and counterjungle meanwhile you're just watching. Team can't do shit because Lee already did the job of helping laners to be stronger. Worst situation
You would say "Why didn't you help the lanes before him?", I say : He got 6 abilities lvl 3. I got 3. With long cooldowns. So its harder than you think
I was a jungle main last season and thought it was pretty bad, don't think I'll be a jungle main this season. Riot clearly hates junglers and has zero idea on how to make them feel fun to play.
taking jg diff to a whole new meaning LUL

Jg feels really off. Camps give 0 xp its insane and ofc gankiing top is ofc not happening with how important drakes are. Thing is if u happen to be slightly behind then ure fucked u cannot gank cuz ure like 3 lvls behind the enemy and farming gives no xp so u don't level up unless u gank sbjcb like I mentioned before is impossible at that point. I had a game where I was like 40 cs ahead and I was still behind in level. Only way to win this season as jg is to track enemy jg farm camp bot and ivnsde of u deny him camps then he's behind and won't catch up

Just started playing jungle again during this preseason (mid main) and even while being really sloppy cleaning my jungle I was only 1 or 2 levels behind my laners so, I also had a lot of fun, less ganking and more objectives controls, especially with warwick :

https://i.imgur.com/NIwiozr.png

I agree that drakes are very important now (herald not this much), I was basically behind most of the games, but as I was securing every drake we ended up winning.

> [{quoted}](name=Starcraft243ver,realm=EUW,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=RxdNcmcR,comment-id=000c,timestamp=2019-11-25T12:03:05.454+0000)
>
> Just started playing jungle again during this preseason (mid main) and even while being really sloppy cleaning my jungle I was only 1 or 2 levels behind my laners so, I also had a lot of fun, less ganking and more objectives controls, especially with warwick :
> 
> https://i.imgur.com/NIwiozr.png
> 
> I agree that drakes are very important now (herald not this much), I was basically behind most of the games, but as I was securing every drake we ended up winning.

You also playing one of the most OP junglers at the moment who can clear hella fast thanks to his attk speed boost in his W and damage reduction from camps with the E. Oh and don't forget he can use the mobility of ppl low on health just to get around the jungle and clear faster.

> [{quoted}](name=knightmage101,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=RxdNcmcR,comment-id=000c0000,timestamp=2019-11-25T17:27:00.271+0000)
>
> You also playing one of the most OP junglers at the moment who can clear hella fast thanks to his attk speed boost in his W and damage reduction from camps with the E. Oh and don't forget he can use the mobility of ppl low on health just to get around the jungle and clear faster.

while I agree warwick is in a good state, if you read OP's post he tells us he finds the jungle awfull while playing warwick. (Also shyvana clears twice as fast as ww, warwick lacks AOE damages to match the clear of a shyvana or other champions, warwick strength is he can stay healthy during his clears, but if you kitte correctly, many champions can).

> [{quoted}](name=Starcraft243ver,realm=EUW,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=RxdNcmcR,comment-id=000c00000000,timestamp=2019-11-25T18:25:01.315+0000)
>
> while I agree warwick is in a good state, if you read OP's post he tells us he finds the jungle awfull while playing warwick. (Also shyvana clears twice as fast as ww, warwick lacks AOE damages to match the clear of a shyvana or other champions, warwick strength is he can stay healthy during his clears, but if you kitte correctly, many champions can).

OP is also a man that only plays WW on occasion, get tiamat, bam clears the aoe dmg problem. Again, it's a bit RNG depending on lanes but you can move thru the jungle much faster as WW than most other champions. Shyvana lacks the dmg reduction and doesn't bring the same amount of utility to a gank as warwick does early game. He can come in, dash behind you and fear you back into the enemy laner. Shyvana can... run at you.

Small tips, warwicks movespeed is out of combat movespeed so as long as you poke him, unless he has ult you can kitte him easily. (I miss old warwick so much when it happens).

Tiamat and bami cenders solve a bit the aoe problem but you still will have a not so good clear until you get the titanic hydra, shyvana has an aoe knockup, ranged damages and lots of aoe. Also she deals 20% more damages to drakes and gets bonus stats from killing them.

Warwick is the best jungler in the game r/n my dude. 

You just aren't using him properly for the new jungle.
